definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="diamonds" type="Number">diamonds</variable><variable id="previousRecipe" type="Number">previousRecipe</variable><variable id="generator_distance" type="Number">generator_distance</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="155" y="54"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="81" pinned="false" w="166">This example will test if there is an item in block inventory slot 0, and block inventory slot 1. If there are those items in those slots, then it will remove 1 item from each slot.</comment><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.QUARTZ_BLOCK#0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.QUARTZ_BLOCK#0</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_inv_remove_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_inv_remove_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
